text: Alexander Xavier Mooney (born June 7, 1971) is an American politician. In 2015, he was elected as the U.S. representative from . He is a member of the Republican Party. Mooney was a member of the Maryland State Senate from 1999 to 2011. He is a former chair of the Maryland Republican Party. He is the first Hispanic person elected to Congress from West Virginia. In November 2022, Mooney announced his candidacy for the United States Senate in the 2024 election against Democrat Joe Manchin. He lost the May 2024 Republican primary to Governor Jim Justice. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from West Virginia Category:Politicians from Maryland Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Alex Mooney
